PluginData.Author: Viktor
PluginData.Tooltip: Replace paint on your ship or station
PluginData.Description:
Activate the paint replacement mode by holding down the Alt key while aiming at a block.
Alt+MMB: Replace on the aimed subgrid Ctrl+Alt+MMB: Replace on all subgrids Ctrl+Shift+Alt+MMB: Replace on all connected ships
Demo video: https://youtu.be/8r47laAgTI8
Please note, that the MMB conflicts with the "dump inventory" shortcut, which is frequently used in survival mode. Because of this the plugin is disabled by default in survival mode. Enable it in the configuration dialog only as long as needed.
To access the plugin's configuration press `Ctrl-Alt-/` while in-game and not in the GUI. Select **Paint Replacer** from the list of plugin shown in the popup dialog. Any changes to the configuration are applied immediately.
For more information please see the plugin's GitHub page: https://github.com/viktor-ferenczi/se-paint-replacer
